name: expense-tracker
description: Personal finance management application built with SvelteKit, following DDD and Hexagonal Architecture

scripts.dev:shell: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app sh
scripts.db:shell: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U expense_tracker -d expense_tracker
scripts.db:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres
scripts.test: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm vitest
scripts.test:coverage: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm vitest run --coverage
scripts.lint: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm prettier --check . && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm eslint .
scripts.lint:fix: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm prettier --write . && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm eslint . --fix
scripts.typecheck: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm svelte-kit sync && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app pnpm tsc --noEmit
scripts.setup: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker system prune -f

author: Claude Code
